product_name: Mountain House Neapolitan Ice Cream - Single Serving
long_description: Ice cream to enjoy anywhere--real ice cream is freeze-dried to create a tasty take-along treat that needs no refrigeration. No preparation required--just open and enjoy. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
